# Google MCP Web App Project

This is a Next.js web application that integrates with Google Maps MCP server to interact with various Google services like location search, directions, and todo management.

## Project Setup Progress

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - Next.js app with Google MCP integration for Azure deployment
- [x] Scaffold the Project - Complete Next.js setup with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
- [x] Customize the Project - Implemented Google MCP integration and todo management features
- [x] Install Required Extensions - Dependencies installed successfully
- [x] Compile the Project - Build completed successfully, ready for deployment
- [x] Create and Run Task - Development and build tasks configured
- [x] Launch the Project - Ready for Azure deployment
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - Comprehensive README and deployment guides created

## Technologies Used
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- React 19
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Google Maps MCP Server integration (Streamable HTTP)
- Azure Static Web Apps deployment configuration
- Lucide React icons

## Google Services Integration
- Google Maps Places API via MCP
- Location search and place details
- Directions and route planning
- Location-based todo management
